title: for industrial use, other than a service industry unless the application is accompanied by NOC from the appropriate officer of the Industries Department of the Govt
clause_text: for industrial use, other than a service industry unless the application is accompanied by NOC from the appropriate officer of the Industries Department of the Govt. according to the prevailing Industrial Location policy;
